title: Pepper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bark at someone. They learn someone barked at them. If they're an Insurgent, you learn each other's identities. 3 uses.
- Be cute at someone's house. This will cause the abilities of your target and their visitors to fail. Insurgents will not have their ability fail and will instead be healed.
- Aggressively bark at someone. They will be redirected to themselves.
- Bite someone. They fucking die.

desc:
Post 3684
*Up next, the cutest thing on the planet, Pepper the small puppy!*
*Awwwwwww!*
